What are the differences between normal cigarettes and Electronic Cigarettes? 
 1. Does not contain tar and other harmful chemicals; 
 2. No need to burn, no cigarette ash; 
 3. NO secondhand smoke and NO environment pollution; 
 4. Use it anytime, anywhere. 
 
 What’s the battery of e cigarette lifespan? 
 The battery of e cigarette lifespan is depends on the way of smoking. We usually use the puffs to measure the lifespan. Under normal smoking conditions, new battery lasts about 300-350 puffs, which is equivalent to one pack of cigarettes. 
 
 How to store your e-cigarettes? 
 Please store your e cigarette in a cool \& dry place, or in the refrigerator. When store in the refrigerator, please put your it into a bag or a sealed original package to keep moisture. Warm remind that please keep your e cigarette at room temperature before using it again. 
 
 Can I smoke e cigarettes in no-smoking zones?
 Smoking in no-smoking zones depends on the laws of different countries and regions. Most countries and regions NO-smoking zones allow to smoke e cigarette. However, there are some areas where e cigarette is explicitly prohibited, so please do not smoke e cigarettes there.. 
 
 Does e cigarette need fire? 
 No, there is no need to ignite electronic smoke. Electronic cigarette is an electronic product. 
 Can electronic cigarettes quit smoking? 
 E-cigarette is a substitute for safe smoking compared to traditional cigarettes. Many users of electronic cigarettes said that using e-cigarettes does not make them lose the pleasure of smoking. E-cigarettes is a healthy way of smoking. And for health reasons, it’s a good choice for smokers who want to quit smoking. 
 
 Who will smoke electronic cigarettes? 
 Electronic cigarettes contain nicotine, which is not a medical quit smoking product. E-cigarette users should above 18 years old. Smokers with health problems use electronic cigarettes should be under the guidance of doctors. Electronic cigarettes should not be placed in places easily accessible to children and pets. 
 
 How does electronic cigarette work? 
 E-cigarettes are electronic devices that generate smoke by heating nicotine-containing E liquid. Smoker smokes through the transport system inside the cigarette to achieve the effect of smoking. This kind of smoking is smoke-free, tar-free, and does not produce carbon monoxide. Stinky. 
 What is electronic cigarette? 
 E cigarettes is an alternative to traditional cigarettes. Electronic cigarettes provide a smoke-free, soot-free, smoking-free, real-life smoking experience. The key to e-cigarettes is the elimination of burning and fumes, because e-cigarettes can be smoked without ignition. E liquid heating by atomizer and produce smoke which same as cigarette. It is smoke-free, tar-free, and does not produce carbon monoxide and odor as a substitute for traditional cigarettes.

一. Special prompt For your protection, please read this “User Service Agreement”(hereinafter referred to as "this Agreement") carefully before you register to our services and make sure that you fully understand the terms before registration. Please carefully read and decide to accept all the terms in this agreement or to not. You are not entitled to register, log in or use the services covered by this agreement unless you accept all the terms of this agreement. Such behaviors as registration, login and use will be deemed as an agreement to be bound by the terms. This Agreement defines the rights and obligations between CIGGO and the users regarding the services provided by "CIGGO" (hereinafter referred to as "services")."User" means the person who registers, logs in and uses the service. This agreement may be updated by CIGGO at any time. And the updated terms of the agreement will supersede the original terms of the agreement without further notice. Users can access the latest version of the agreement in this APP. If the user does not accept the revised terms after terms’ modification of the agreement, please stop using the services provided by CIGGO. If the user continues to use the services provided by the platform, it will be deemed to accept the revised agreement. 
 二.Registration
 a. Before using the services, users need to register for a "CIGGO" account, which should be bounded with mobile number. Please use the phone number that has not been tied to the account and has not blocked by CIGGO platform. CIGGO can change the account registration and binding according to user requirements or products without prior notice to users. b.If the registered applicant has been banned by CIGGO or is suspected of false registration and misuse of other people's name, and other reasons that cannot be obtained, CIGGO will refuse The application for registration. c. In view of the binding registration method of "CIGGO" account, the user agrees that your mobile phone number and mobile device identification code will be used when registering. d. When users register and use this service, CIGGO needs to collect personal information that can identify users so that CIGGO can contact users when necessary or provide better user experience. The information collected includes but is not limited to the user's name and address. CIGGO agrees that the use of this information will be restricted by the protection of the third user's privacy information. 
 三.Account security 
 a. Once the user is registered successfully, he will become a user of CIGGO together with a user name and password, and have the right to use his own username and password to login to CIGGO at any time. 
 b. The user is fully responsible for the security of the user's name and password, while taking full responsibility for all activities and affairs that its users name carry on. 
 c. Users shall not, in any form, assign or authorize others to use their own CIGGO user names. 
 d. If the user leaks the password, it can lead to adverse legal consequences. Therefore, if the password security of users is threatened for any reason, the user should immediately contact the customer service staff of CIGGO, otherwise the consequences will be overconfident. 
 四.User statements and warranties a. The user promises that it is a civil subject with full civil capacity and has the ability to conclude a transaction to fulfill its obligations. b. Users have a duty to provide their real information at the time of registration, and ensure the validity and safety of the content such as mobile phone number, name and region, which ensure that the CIGGO staff can get in touch with the user through the above contact information. At the same time, the user also has the obligation to update the relevant registration information timely when the relevant information is actually changed. c. Any content produced, uploaded, copied, published or transmitted by the users through the process of using CIGGO (including but not limited to: account picture, name, the user instructions for registration information and certification information, or Send, reply and related link pages for text, voice, picture, video and graphic) shall not violate the relevant national laws and regulations , including but not limited to the following principles: (1) Opposing the basic principles of the Constitution; (2) Endanger national security, divulge state secrets, subvert state power and destroy national unity; (3) Harming national honor and interests; (4) inciting ethnic hatred, ethnic discrimination and undermining national unity; (5) to undermine the state's religious policies and promote cults and feudal superstitions; (6) spreading rumors, disturbing social order and undermining social stability; (7) disseminating obscenity, pornography, gambling, violence, murder, terror or abetting a crime; (8) insulting or slandering another person or infringing upon the lawful rights and interests of others; (9) other contents prohibited by laws and administrative regulations. d. Users shall not use the "CIGGO" account or the service to make, upload, copy, publish or disseminate the contents that interfere with the normal operation of "CIGGO" and infringe upon the legitimate rights and interests of other users or third parties: (1) Containing any sexual or sexual innuendo; (2) contents containing abuse, intimidation or threat; (3) contain harassment, spam, malicious information, and decoy information.
